remarks: Elementhood in the set of absolute values.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abvfval.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
abvfval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
abvfval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
isabv $p |- ( R e. Ring -> ( F e. A <-> ( F : B --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) /\ A. x e. B ( ( ( F ` x ) = 0 <-> x = .0. ) /\ A. y e. B ( ( F ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) x. ( F ` y ) ) /\ ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) <_ ( ( F ` x ) + ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d x y $.
